title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: The popup menu in the Java editor ruler does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor.2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a menu should pop up to allow the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor.2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a menu should pop up to allow the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor.2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler to trigger the popup menu not appearing.
